name: DGU: Death God University
summary: DGU is a 3rd person 3D adventure/puzzle game where the player plays as a student of the Death God University studying to become a death god assistant.

name: D/Generation
summary:
Alone with your jetpack, you have flown from Finland across the Urals and the entire length of Asia to deliver a package to Genoq Biolabs in Singapore. You land on the building`s 80th floor setback, finding nobody there to greet you. When you enter the building, the main door snaps shut behind you, and you narrowly escape being killed by the building`s security system.

You find the receptionist hiding behind her desk. She tells you that Genoq`s head scientist, Derrida, has been demanding the package you`re carrying. His last panicked message came over an hour ago. This package is more important than you could have thought.
You realize that there is only one course of action, that you `must` bring the package to Derrida, and, if at all possible, rescue any survivors you find along the way.

name: DGU: Death God University - Midterm Mania
summary: Introducing a brand new level with top secret military missions, the Army Barracks. You have two targets to deal with while every mistake of yours could prove to be your undoing.

name: DGU: Death God University - Finals Week
summary: The Death Gods at the university have been avoiding these targets for a long time due to their dangerous nature. However, it is this very nature that makes it a perfect fit for a test to determine DGUs best student!

name: D.Gray-man: Kami no Shito-tachi
summary: Play as characters from the popular manga and anime. Fight the evil Akuma by using the stylus and touch screen.

name: DGGWare
summary: DGGWare is a collection of meme based micro games in the vein of WarioWare. The game centers around streamer Destiny's community and covers topics from gaming, politics, philosophy, debate, art, culture and drama.

name: D.Gray-man: Sousha no Shikaku
summary: Play the story of D.Gray-man in this action-adventure game.

name: DGU: Death God University - Sinister Semester
summary: Introducing a spooky new level ‘Asylum & Rehab’ with two new interesting targets to plot and set a trap for. Put your insanity on display in this macabre setting!

name: D/Generation HD
summary: A virus has escaped at Genoq HQ in London, and Derrida, the lead scientist at Genoq, has asked you to help save the day. Travel up through the Genoq skyscraper rescuing the stranded employees and putting an end to the escaped virus.
